EmailTemplate.name: Create Login
EmailTemplate.subject: New Login
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear ,
Account Number:
You can now access your account at www.business.officedepot.com. Be sure to save this website to your favorites for easy access!
Username:
Password: Welcome1 (you will be prompted to change your password)
Change your password.
Set up security questions.
You are now ready to shop! Place your items in your cart, select payment option in the drop down, then submit! Your order is being processed! Remember, if you order by 5:00 pm your time (4:00 pm recommended for PST) you will receive most items the very next business day.
DELIVERY
Order by 5:00 p.m. local time via phone/online or by 3:00 p.m. local time via email and your order of $50 or more will be delivered FREE the next business day between 8:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. local time, Monday through Friday, if You are in one of Office Depot's local delivery areas. Most furniture and oversized items, special orders, custom printing orders and certain technology items are excluded. Delivery is subject to product availability. Orders less than $50 and orders outside Office Depot's local delivery areas will incur delivery fees as follows:
Order Value (pre-tax)Delivery Fee $24.99 and Below $9.95 $25.00 - $49.99 $7.95 $50.00 or more FREE
Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
